blocking_reason: Integration tests failing (WebSocket scalability issues). Security review incomplete (3 critical/high findings). Cannot begin UAT until these are resolved.
blocker_details: WebSocket server drops connections at >50 concurrent users (7 integration tests failing)
Critical security finding: QR token race condition (SEC-QR-001)
High security finding: QR code spoofing vulnerability (SEC-QR-002)
High security finding: WebSocket authentication insufficient (SEC-WS-001)
High security finding: Vulnerable dependency in mobile app (DEP-7821)
notes: UAT CANNOT START until integration tests pass and security review approves. Feature has been rolled back from UAT to DEVELOPMENT stage due to critical issues discovered during testing phase.
